01.headline: Rubic
01.summary: Odosprotocol added in Rubic. Provides routing options to base, zksync era, optimism, etc.

01.headline: LiFi
01.summary: Spot and perp futures exchange, print3r integrated with LiFi.

01.headline: Wormhole
01.summary: Wormhole ZK. Upgrade in message verification.

01.headline: Chainlink
01.summary: Cross-chain swap powered by Chainlink - XSwap.

01.headline: Squid
01.summary: Squid Raises $4m in Strategic Funding Round led by Polychain Capital.

01.headline: Cashmere
01.summary: Unified cross-chain liquidity layer between EVM and non-EVM ecosystems.

01.headline: Picasso Network
01.summary: Marginfi collaborating to integrate lst and utilize it in Solana restaking layer.

01.headline: Pike Finance
01.summary: Mainnet live. Borrow, lend, leverage, and earn across any chain. Access liquidity from across all of DeFi, natively.

02.headline: Dymension
02.summary: Wormhole will be integrating Dymension. Users can transfer their assets to RollApps and leverage Dymension's shared liquidity.

02.headline: Arkham
02.summary: Arkham will be providing data on over $173M of Total Value Locked (TVL), as well as the over 2.6M unique addresses on-chain.

02.headline: Bridge
02.summary: Fully on-chain, transparent and permissionless design of Bridge.

05.headline: Farcaster
05.summary: Introducing Ferps - Simplifying the future of Finance. One-click long/short positions, smart wallets, and gas fees are covered, courtesy of @biconomy and @FetcchX.

05.headline: Particle
05.summary: Launchpad is now live. MerlinLayer2 is the first project on the launchpad. A Native Bitcoin Layer2 powered by BitMapTech, building upon the native assets, protocols, and products on Bitcoin Layer1, to make BTC fun again.

05.headline: Orbiter
05.summary: Berachain testnet integrated into orbiter finance. An EVM-equivalent L1 built on the Cosmos SDK and powered by Proof of Liquidity.

05.headline: XY Finance
05.summary: XY finance, bridge aggregator integrated AcrossProtocol.

05.headline: AltLayer
05.summary: First provider to build and support Arbitrum orbit with EigenDA.

05.headline: Buildadera
05.summary: Kodiak raised $2M in seed round and incubated by buildabera. Berachain's native liquidity hub.

06.headline: ENS and DNS
06.summary: Web Registry GoDaddy, Ethereum Name Service Connect Domain Names With Crypto Wallets. Users will be able to link their internet domain names to their ENS addresses.

06.headline: Sudoswap
06.summary: Sudoswap is now live on Base.

06.headline: Oxngmi's new Dapp
06.summary: Allows token swaps without initial ETH. it uses permits to do a swap that requires no initial ETH, so you can get your first ETH.

06.headline: Dymension
06.summary: Mainnet is live. Validators were not able to reach consensus because there was a bad validator in the set. Chorus One, with 34.8% of the staked tokens delegated to it.

06.headline: Hypr Network
06.summary: Collaborating with hyperlane to bring permissionless interoperability and bridging to the ecosystem.

06.headline: Hyperlane and hashi-based Interchain Security Module
06.summary: The new Hashi-ISM allows Hyperlane Apps to access Hashi’s 17+ adapters for additive security. By specifying the Hashi ISM, message recipients can leverage Hashi’s additive security and have their message verified by multiple cross-chain rails.

06.headline: LayerZero
06.summary: Gelato bringing L0 v2 to all Gelato RaaS solving interoperability in a world of hundreds of thousands of L2s, App Chains, & Rollups.

06.headline: 4 buzz words in Crypto
06.summary: Arjun from LiFi shares some insights on currently trending tech and word in the space. Interop, Modularity, RWA and AI.

07.headline: Succinct Network
07.summary: The Protocol for Programmable Truth. A decentralized prover network where provers compete for the privilege of generating your ZK proof.

07.headline: Astar Network
07.summary: Astar zkEVM will plug into Polygon's Aggregation Layer and LxLy bridge.

07.headline: SuperVerse
07.summary: SUPER is going cross-chain through integration with LayerZero.

07.headline: LiFi
07.summary: Flooz integrates with LiFi. Traders can now swap their assets across 8+ chains supported by LiFi.

07.headline: deBridge
07.summary: deBridge IaaS is officially live. Neon_EVM as the first user. Any team can make their ecosystem instantly accessible from EVM or SVM chains with single subscription.

07.headline: ChainFlip
07.summary: Introduces chainflipBot. It keeps track of swaps, liquidity movements and validator stats.

08.headline: Axelar Network
08.summary: No code Interchain Token service. Enables quick creation or transformation of tokens across different blockchain networks. Facilitates 1:1 token bridging across all EVM chains supported by Axelar.

08.headline: LayerZero
08.summary: Angle Protocol transitions to a fully on-chain governance setup leveraging layerzero for cross chain voting.

08.headline: PersistenceOne
08.summary: Brings restaking to cosmos. Along with restaking comes 'leveraged' restaking by borrowing LSTs.

08.headline: Meson
08.summary: Cross-chain support to Conflux Network's Bitcoin Layer2 solution. Seamless BTC cross-chain swap between Conflux's Bitcoin L2 and other blockchains, further strengthening the adoption of BTC assets.

08.headline: Socket
08.summary: 1M ARB for socket ecosystem. 700k for any bridges in Socket APIs, SDK, or Plugin. 300k for bridging to arbitrum and orbit chains. From Feb 12th to March 31st.

08.headline: Superform Labs
08.summary: Raised $6.5M. Live in early access on 7 chains. Superform is The Universal Yield Marketplace. Users: Discover vaults, manage positions, and get instant access using any token from any chain.

08.headline: deBridge
08.summary: Zeta markets integrated deBridge widget, opening up virtually instant deposits from 9 chains to high-speed perp trading on Solana.

08.headline: Infrared - Berachain
08.summary: Understanding iBGT: The Future of Liquid Staking on Berachain. Infrared Berachain Governance Token(iBGT) further enhances BGT’s utility by providing a liquid wrapper that simplifies a few complexities of PoL.

09.headline: Owlto
09.summary: To be listed in Binance web3 wallet.

09.headline: Meson
09.summary: Partnership with joy protocol, a passkey wallet that streamlines your entry into web3.

09.headline: LiFi
09.summary: Nest Wallet has integrated lifiprotocol to enable cross chain swaps across 8 chains and L2s. Nest Wallet serves wallet security using on-chain 2FA.

09.headline: Restaking Players
09.summary: KelpDAO, Picasso, SSV, Pendle, RestakeFi, Renzo, etc.
